name: Carp
description: A common freshwater fish found in calm waters.

name: Trout
description: A popular game fish with delicious meat.

name: Catfish
description: A bottom-dwelling fish with distinctive whiskers.

name: Frost Koi
description: A mystical fish that can only be caught when frozen solid.

name: Salmon
description: A migratory fish known for swimming upstream.

name: Pike
description: An aggressive predator fish with sharp teeth.

name: Bass
description: A popular sport fish known for its fighting spirit.

name: Crystal Salmon
description: A rare salmon encased in ice, requiring freezing techniques to catch.

name: Phantom Bass
description: An ethereal fish that only responds to mystical charm.

name: Marlin
description: A magnificent billfish prized by sport fishermen.

name: Mackerel
description: A schooling fish with distinctive markings.

name: Shark
description: An apex predator of the ocean depths.

name: Electric Eel
description: This dangerous eel must be shocked into submission before catching.

name: Swordfish
description: A large predatory fish with a distinctive sword-like bill.

name: Giant Squid
description: A massive cephalopod from the ocean's depths.

name: Anglerfish
description: A deep-sea predator with a bioluminescent lure.

name: Thunder Shark
description: A legendary shark that feeds on electricity itself.
